settings.heading: What are PFAS and why are they a problem in dental floss?
settings.row_content: PFAS are a group of harmful chemicals used for their water- and stain-resistant properties. In some traditional flosses, PFAS can potentially be absorbed into your body, posing concerns for long-term health.

settings.heading: Is PFAS-free floss as effective as traditional floss?
settings.row_content: Yes! Ela Mint Floss is carefully designed with a vegetable wax coating and ideal thickness to remove plaque and debris just as well as traditional floss but without chemical concerns.

settings.heading: Are there other benefits to using Boka Floss?
settings.row_content: Yes! In addition to being PFAS-free, our flosses are also free from BPA, Teflon, parabens, and SLS.

settings.heading: Does Boka Floss come in different flavors?
settings.row_content: Yes! In addition to our classic Ela Mint, we also offer a Cinna Mint flavor for a warm, spicy twist.

settings.heading: Is Boka Floss suitable for sensitive gums?
settings.row_content: Yes! Our gentle formula and smooth coating are designed to be comfortable even for those with sensitive gums.

settings.heading: How often should I replace my Floss?
settings.row_content: Dentists generally recommend replacing your floss container every 1-2 months to prevent bacteria build-up and maintain optimal hygiene.

settings.heading: Questions About Boka PFAS-Free Floss
settings.description: Have questions about Boka's PFAS-free floss? Browse our FAQs to learn how it can improve your oral care routine. Find out about PFAS health concerns and our floss's effectiveness.
